extendedInfo.description: Feudfan app shows all your Wordfeud game data and history!Tired of keeping track of the games you played against your mother? But you do need to know who is the better player?Ever wonder how many Wordfeud games you played sofar?And how many you won and lost?Would you like to know your average score per game, and how it is developing? Forgot your highest score ever (and your lowest)? Curious how you stack up against other Wordfeud players? And are you getting better?Feudfan app answers all these questions and more: Feudfan app shows your latest game data and complete history from the moment you start using feudfan in clear graphs, images and text.No need to enter any data yourself!Simply log on with your Wordfeud login and start tracking today. Feudfan automatically collects your game data on your behalf and updates your statistics when you start the app.You can even choose to see statistics for games played on standard board only.Feudfan app reports several statistics:ME: your personal game data- total number of games you played- how many games you won and lost- track your win ratio through time- highest and lowest score- average score and trendAll this displayed in clear graphs since your first use of FeudfanFRIENDS: how are you stacking up against your friends?See everyone you ever played against, and for each opponent:- total number of games played- number of games won and lost- date of end of last game- easy thumbs up or down win or loss indicator- indicator of active gameNo longer any need to note down the result of each game in your agenda or notebook!RANKING: how do you rank in the world of Wordfeud?Based on a number of statistics, Feudfan automatically calculates a world ranking for ALL users of Feudfan app when you start up.- instant display of your world wide Wordfeud rank- for standard board games only- for games played on both standard AND random boardFeud fan!

reviews.title: Cannot login
reviews.comment: Got new phone samsung galaxy s4.  Will not let me login.  Will not let me finish entering my email address on the login prompt. Stops after 7 characters.   Please advise.
reviews.author: Lisa Holmes

reviews.title: GS4 stock
reviews.comment: Use to work like a charm. Now, won\'t let me log in?? Tried resetting pw & email.  Still doesn\'t work. Pls fix!!! Other than that, great job
reviews.author: Dee Mom

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: I have had many login problems. Haven\'t been able to log on in over a week. Please fix this problem. I have the galaxy note 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stats completely wrong.
reviews.comment: I installed the app, it said that the stats were from December 2012 and that I had played 17 games, I know that to be completely wrong. Couldn\'t even reset stats from today. Uninstalling the app, waste of time.
reviews.author: Jeremy Giles

reviews.title: Wont open
reviews.comment: Cant open the app. Tried entering my email and password but still wont open. Frustrating.
reviews.author: Nichole VanRite

reviews.title: Good for tracking games with friends.
reviews.comment: Otherwise. Rank is pretty pointless. It doesn\'t account for the difficulty of your opponents. Win percent isn\'t that cool because you control it by how hard your opponents are. Strictly for tracking records with friends.
reviews.author: Nate Bush

reviews.title: Paul77
reviews.comment: It\'s a lot more smoother now which is great...also the fact that my rank has now increased to #9 !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unable to log in for weeks. It use to work well.
reviews.author: Charles Black

reviews.title: Great lil app
reviews.comment: Works great. Had problem switching stats to normal board only mode, but cleared app data and logged back in and all is well!
reviews.author: Matthew Sehenuk

reviews.title: Login issue
reviews.comment: Can\'t register because I can\'t type my email! Please fix. Galaxy 3
reviews.author: Vi Nieves

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: I\'ve played over 700 games and now cant put my email address in because i have an s3 .......please fix this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on my SG3
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me enter my password, so can\'t log in. Liked it in my SG2 though.
reviews.author: Anne Laugesen

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t calculate your ranking from every game you play, only people on your friends list. Half job done. Not good enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus
reviews.comment: Haven\'t been able to log in once : ( uninstall....
reviews.author: Heike Buchgeister-Long

reviews.title: Login issues
reviews.comment: Was great but now can\'t login, just keeps cycling, please fix because my finished games automatically delete after 72 hours
reviews.author: Skalisko Raska
